Name: 3D Printing Canada
What We Do: At 3D Printing Canada, we specialize in industrial and commercial additive manufacturing solutions. As part of N3 Technologies Inc., we bring over 40 years of experience in advanced manufacturing, CNC machining, and industrial tooling to everything we do. Our mission is to help manufacturers, engineers, and product developers accelerate prototyping, improve part performance, and reduce production costs through cutting-edge 3D printing technologies. We supply a wide range of professional 3D printing systems, from desktop engineering workhorses to large-format industrial machines. Our lineup includes trusted brands like Bambu Lab, BigRep, Sinterit, Intamsys, Modix, Makerbot, Ultimaker, Vision Miner, and Caracol, covering FDM, resin, SLS, high-temp, and robotic extrusion technologies. Beyond printers, we offer one of Canada’s largest selections of industrial-grade filaments and resins. Our inventory includes high-performance materials such as carbon-fiber reinforced nylon, PEI/ULTEM, PEEK, ABS, ASA, PETG, and TPU, many compatible with multi-material systems and enclosed printers for demanding applications in aerospace, automotive, medical, and tooling environments. We also stock critical components, spare parts, nozzles, hotends, build platforms, and motion systems to support maintenance and performance upgrades. What sets us apart is our ability to support businesses beyond equipment sales: We offer custom print services for prototypes, short-run production, and functional end-use parts using high-performance materials and large-format systems. Our design team provides CAD modeling, consultation, print optimization, and engineering support for complex projects. We offer repair and maintenance services, technical onboarding, and in-depth training workshops to help your team adopt or scale additive manufacturing efficiently. We work closely with manufacturers, machine shops, engineers, research labs, educators, and startups across North America. Whether you're modernizing your prototyping workflow, improving supply chain flexibility, or building a digital inventory, we provide the technology, expertise, and service to make it happen. 3D Printing Canada isn’t just a reseller, we’re a strategic partner committed to advancing digital manufacturing for Canadian industry
Address: 36 Ditton Drive Unit 3 Hamilton, ON L8W 0A9 Canada

Name: Abraham Innovation Systems Inc
What We Do: Abraham Innovation Systems Inc. (AISI) is a machine vision system specialist that designs and builds intelligent vision solutions used for quality control in the automotive industry. Our vision inspection systems are designed to produce major improvements in productivity to help manufacturing drive production costs down, boost productivity, reduce energy waste and ensure product quality. AISI has installed more than 100 inspection systems in the last 5 years. Our customers span across the pharmaceutical, automotive, aerospace, and packaging industries. Our Expertise In vision inspection projects, a level of ambiguity always exists. AISI has overcome these challenges and has successfully developed many innovative solutions that meet customer expectations with a quick return on investment. Over the past five years, AISI has become a key vendor to OEM plants in Ontario and Michigan. AISI designs and supplies solutions to integrate with the customers’ existing final assembly lines. Our inspection systems are featured with repeatability, accuracy, and robustness. Our systems operate 7/24 in manufacturing environments.
Categories: Automation Systems, Dimensional Measurement, Identification Systems, Imaging Products, Industrial building automation systems, Industrial image processing systems, Inspection Equipment, Laser Marking, Machine Vision, Non-Destructive Testing, Software - Quality, Software - Reliability, Tool Inspection

Name: Abrasive Technology
What We Do: Abrasive Technology, founded in 1971, is a global leader in superabrasive grinding and tooling solutions. The Company's diversified portfolio operates through four specialized divisions: Aerospace and Defense, providing mission-critical grinding wheels and coatings for advanced materials; Superabrasives, delivering high-performance diamond and CBN solutions for industrial applications; Medical and Dental, featuring the world-renowned Two Striper® brand of diamond dental burs alongside precision medical instruments; and PCD/PCBN Tooling, offering ultra-precision cutting tools for high-performance machining. With over five decades of innovation and growth, the Company has built a strong intellectual property foundation with over 140 registered patents and trademarks.

Name: Abtex LLC
What We Do: Abtex brushes are engineered tools, very flexible and unique manufacturing process allows us to infinitely vary any aspect of the brush. Our engineering approach and our applications laboratory enable us to produce a brush that best meets your specific needs. This approach ensures that Abtex will provide the most effective and efficient design possible. As we develop brushes for new applications, our Systems Group responds with automated brush deburring systems. Should you need an automated process, Abtex is uniquely positioned to provide a system designed to extract the maximum performance from our brushes. If you are looking for something specific and don’t see it, give us a call. We can make it for you. Likewise, if you simply think that an abrasive filament brush might represent an answer for your application, call us. With our extensive applications experience, we can quickly offer guidance.
